name: SupportEirikaSethC
_source: speak;Eirika;How fare you, Seth?|Ever since the castle fell you have been protecting me,|despite your own injuries...
speak;Seth;Would that I could have served you better, my lady...|You were not meant to see such things.|But my wound has closed up, and it does not affect my lance arm...
speak;Eirika;Wait.{br}Show it to me.|Look. The wound has closed, but it has not yet fully healed.
speak;Seth;......|What made you think of this, my lady?

speak;Eirika;Your fighting is as superb as ever, Seth.|But when you raise your lance, I see a flicker of pain on your face,|as if you were merely enduring it...|But it only lasts a moment. Perhaps it is all just my imagination...
speak;Seth;Your Highness, please put your mind at ease.|My wound has healed. There is no reason to worry.
speak;Eirika;I would that were so, Seth.|Please do not overextend yourself.{br}I beg this of you.|Without you, I may not be able to continue this quest...
speak;Seth;You praise me too much, my lady...
